# KARMASTAT

Summary:
KARMASTAT provides advanced medical sample size calculators, power analysis, reporting tools, and statistical references for clinical and epidemiological research.

Audience:
Researchers, clinicians, biostatisticians, and study designers.

Base URL:
https://karmastat.in

Policies:
- Calculators and tools are informational and educational.
- No patient data is stored or processed.
- Content is not medical advice.

Pages:
https://karmastat.in/
https://karmastat.in/calculator/descriptive
https://karmastat.in/calculator/ttest
https://karmastat.in/calculator/comparative
https://karmastat.in/calculator/diagnostic
https://karmastat.in/calculator/clinical-trials
https://karmastat.in/calculator/survival
https://karmastat.in/calculator/power-analysis
https://karmastat.in/calculator/effect-size
https://karmastat.in/calculator/meta-analysis
https://karmastat.in/calculator/cluster-multilevel
https://karmastat.in/calculator/bayesian
https://karmastat.in/calculator/agreement
https://karmastat.in/tools/report-generator
https://karmastat.in/tools/sensitivity-analysis
https://karmastat.in/tools/checklists
https://karmastat.in/references
https://karmastat.in/contact
https://karmastat.in/support
